QuestData.Title: By the Sea, Nevermore
QuestData.Description: The Klaxxi'va have spoken to me, outsider. The paragon is hidden in the Briny Muck only, he is not so hidden anymore.$b$bThe lizard men surround him. He cannot fall into their scaley hands.$b$bYou will find him; you will awaken him. Do not return without him!$b$bIf you do this the Klaxxi will be pleased with us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Klaxxi Tuning Fork on the Ocean-Worn Rocks to awaken the paragon.
